content: a complete tutorial on making the seashell carpet by magic carpet studio copyrights notice you may make a carpet using my design and even sell the carpet to make lots of money if you make the carpet it would be great if you e-mailed me its photo and wrote a few things about yourself like your name and where you re from etc you should if you make this carpet and put photos of it on your blog or a website or your facebook page you should always clearly state where the design came from you may not claim this design to be yours copy this design to your website or a blog instead provide a link to my blog or my ravelry account or my facebook fanpage reprint this design in a magazine or a book without asking me first and paying me for it magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com to make this carpet you will need 1200 meters of cotton string 5 mm thick it s better to order a bit more string just to be on the safe side a crochet hook 10 mm thick in the us size n/p about 8-9 hours of your time this carpet measures roughly 210x170 cm if you use a 5 mm thick cotton string if you use a string of smaller thickness the dimensions will decrease but i can t predict by how much no matter what string you use remember one important thing the crochet hook needs to be twice as thick as the string otherwise the carpet will come out crooked for example if your string is 3 mm thick the crochet hook should be 6 mm thick in the us size j i use the same kind of string they put in sweatshirts to tighten the hood it can be washed in an ordinary washing machine i order my string from a factory in poland http //www polimex net/sklep/index php page=product&id=676&sid=68&lang=en but i have no idea if they are willing to ship small quantities of string overseas another important thing you should be sitting on the carpet while crocheting it this way the carpet will appear as if it has already been washed and blocked because you have been ironing it with your buttocks while crocheting if you crochet the carpet while sitting on the couch it will come out crooked and uneven it took me 6 hours to draw the diagram by hand in the end it covered three sheets of a4 printer paper it was very hard to put it in a scanner and the outcome didn t look very pleasing so i made a photo of it instead magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com i realize that the above diagram is not very clear obiously it s hard to fit a larger photo into a pdf file you can download a bigger
